description: A calculated attribute definition for Customer Profiles

DomainName.description: The unique name of the domain.
DomainName.markdownDescription:
The unique name of the domain.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

CalculatedAttributeName.description: The unique name of the calculated attribute.
CalculatedAttributeName.markdownDescription:
The unique name of the calculated attribute.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z_0-9-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

DisplayName.markdownDescription:
The display name of the calculated attribute.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255

Update requires: No interruption

The description of the calculated attribute.

---

Required: No

AttributeName.description: The name of an attribute defined in a profile object type.
AttributeName.markdownDescription:
The name of an attribute defined in a profile object type.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_.-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

AttributeItem.description: The details of a single attribute item specified in the mathematical expression.
AttributeItem.markdownDescription:
The details of a single attribute item specified in the mathematical expression.

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AttributeList.description: A list of attribute items specified in the mathematical expression.
AttributeList.markdownDescription:
A list of attribute items specified in the mathematical expression.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Expression.description: Mathematical expression that is performed on attribute items provided in the attribute list. Each element in the expression should follow the structure of "{ObjectTypeName.AttributeName}".
Expression.markdownDescription:
Mathematical expression that is performed on attribute items provided in the attribute list. Each element in the expression should follow the structure of "{ObjectTypeName.AttributeName}".

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Allowed Values: DAYS

Update requires: No interruption

Required: No

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption
